archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Select Outbound Purchase Party
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Select the party or parites to whom an outbound product offering purchase in the form of an product offering order will be sent.

properties.value: Select Outbound Purchase Party identifies the most appropriate party or parties, to whom a product offering purchase may be sent. The selection of the party is based on the particular product, service and/or resource requirements and the feasibility of a party being able to meet the requirements.
